package-manager.name: pkgadd
package-manager.title: Libart 3D graphics library
package-manager.description: Libart is a library for high-performance 2D graphics. It supports a very powerful imaging model, basically the same as SVG and the Java 2D API. It includes all PostScript imaging operations, and adds antialiasing and alpha-transparency. It is also highly tuned for incremental rendering. It contains data structures and algorithms suited to rapid, precise computation of Region of Interest, and a two-phase rendering pipeline optimized for interactive display.
